title: Kicked from game?
body: I was playing a game of urf and I randomly lost connection from the game and I still had internet connection. While game was trying to reconnect my league client would allow me to start a new game? I closed all all league programs and it is not letting me reconnect, it is acting like I was never in a game.

replies.body: Ahhhh it sounds like that ARURF game might have actually crashed entirely server side. It's rare, but when it does happen everyone else is booted from the game as well, and nobody will get any penalties. It's as if the game never happened at all.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=FExpAP8v,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-11T22:21:42.956+0000)
>
> Ahhhh it sounds like that ARURF game might have actually crashed entirely server side. It's rare, but when it does happen everyone else is booted from the game as well, and nobody will get any penalties. It's as if the game never happened at all.

i experienced this 2x in the past 2 days (including today) along with a very rare occurrence in AF1 and Ascension
